Works great on my iPhone 3.1.2.  Here's a quick breakdown of the steps for someone who needs help.

1. Jailbreak your iPhone with blackra1n.
2. Download and install Cydia
3. Open Cydia, goto Manage, Sources, Edit, Add, and add cydia.hackulo.us
4. Click done and search for App Sync for 3.1 and install.
5. Download the Torrent
6. Open one of the .rar files and extract to your desktop
7. Double click the Grand Theft Auto - Chinatown Wars 1.0-poedgirl[C4iD].ipa.  This will add it to your iTunes application library.
8. Sync your iPhone/iPod Touch and your good to go!

Enjoy.  Thanks for the great torrent and saving me $10.
